DOC.detailed_description: 30 woman diagnose PCOS ( age 30-50 year ) enrol study . 15 woman randomize atorvastatin group 15 placebo group . The woman PCOS participate study require use safe non-hormonal contraception medication . The study include transvaginal ultrasonography , serum sample , oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) intra venous tolerance test ( IVGTT ) receive 6 month atorvastatin 20mg/day therapy placebo . Measurements androgen level , pituitary hormone , glucose , insulin inflammatory marker perform .
